cip.render.raytrace.interfaces

Interface IRtGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRtGeometry

    public interface IRtGroup
extends IRtGeometry
    The interface for a group. Objects and lights can be added to a group so that they can be positioned and treated as a single unit.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGeometry(IRtGeometry geo)
      Adds a geometry to the group.
      void addLight(IRtLight lgt)
      Add a light to the group (not yet implemented in any group implementation).
      java.util.List getFlatGeometryList()
      Get a flattened list of the geometires in this group.
      java.util.List getFlatLightList()
      Get a flattend list of lights in the group (not yet implemented in any group implementation).
      java.util.List getGeometryList()
      Get a list of the geometries in this group.

      • Methods inherited from interface cip.render.raytrace.interfaces.IRtGeometry

        getBvIntersection, getConvexHullVertices, getNaturalCoordinates, getRayIntersection, getType, initSampling, isConvex, isInside, testShadow

    • Method Detail

      • addGeometry

        void addGeometry(IRtGeometry geo)
        Adds a geometry to the group. NOTE: because this is a rendering interface as opposed to an editing interfaces, it is assumed that the object is fully defined when it is added to the object and will not be altered once it has been added to the object.
        Parameters:
        geo - a geometry,

      • getGeometryList

        java.util.List getGeometryList()
        Get a list of the geometries in this group. This list preserves the hierarchy of the group. Specifically, groups that are contained within this geometry are returned as groups.
        Returns:
        Returns the list of geometries contained in this group.

      • getFlatGeometryList

        java.util.List getFlatGeometryList()
        Get a flattened list of the geometires in this group. Any group hierarchy is flattened and the is a list of all the transformed objects as they are positioned relative to the object axis system of this geoup.
        Returns:
        Returns the flattened list of objects.

      • addLight

        void addLight(IRtLight lgt)
        Add a light to the group (not yet implemented in any group implementation).
        Parameters:
        lgt - a light.

      • getFlatLightList

        java.util.List getFlatLightList()
        Get a flattend list of lights in the group (not yet implemented in any group implementation).
        Returns:
        Returns the flattened list of lights.
